script:
movings := movings    [keep anneemut, coddep]
                    [rename anneemut to year, coddep to nuts3]
                    [filter year = 2020]
                    [aggr nb_movings := count(year) group by nuts3]
                    [drop year]
                    [calc identifier nuts3 := nuts3];

dwellings := dwellings    [keep COMMUNE]
                      [rename COMMUNE to city]
                      [calc nuts3 := substr(city, 1, 2)]
                      [aggr nb_dwellings := count(city) group by nuts3]
                      [drop city]
                      [calc identifier nuts3 := nuts3];

movings_others := movings [filter instr(nuts3, "97") = 0];

movings_97 := movings     [filter instr(nuts3, "97") = 1]
                        [calc nuts3 := "97"]
                        [aggr nb_movings := sum(nb_movings) group by nuts3]
                        [calc identifier nuts3 := nuts3];

movings := union(movings_others, movings_97);

movings_dwellings := inner_join(movings, dwellings)
                        [calc pct := round(nb_movings / nb_dwellings * 100, 2)]
                        [drop nb_dwellings, nb_movings];
